etymology.interpretation: The character 丿 (piě, "slash") is a simple pictogram representing a diagonal line or stroke. It is used as a basic component in many more complex Chinese characters.

examples.chinese: 书法中的丿极富动感(書法中的丿極富動感)。
examples.pinyin: Shūfǎ zhōng de piě jí fù dònggǎn.
examples.english: The slash in calligraphy is full of dynamic expression.

examples.chinese: 他写字时用丿勾勒出灵动的笔触(他寫字時用丿勾勒出靈動的筆觸)，令作品显得生动丰富(令作品顯得生動豐富)。
examples.pinyin: Tā xiězì shí yòng piě gōulè chū língdòng de bǐchù, lìng zuòpǐn xiǎn de shēngdòng fēngfù.
examples.english: When he writes, he uses the slash stroke to outline dynamic brushwork, making the work appear vivid and rich.
